description: Alex Allinson accuses an exam board of lowering grades based on "flawed historical data".
title: Isle of Man education minister 'angry' over results 'downgrading'
title_page: Isle of Man education minister 'angry' over results 'downgrading' - BBC News
maintext: The school has appealed the results after 90% of A2 maths and physics, and 83% of chemistry marks at the school were altered, along with 92% of English language IGCSE grades, she said.
